topic.title: Important Dates
topic.description: Important dates for members of the campus community
topic.creator: admin

announcement.title: November 3 - 21: Winter Registration
announcement.abstract: Winter registration occurs between November 3 and November 21.
announcement.message:
Winter registration occurs between November 3 and November 21.

See: Important Dates & Deadlines
announcement.author: admin

announcement.title: November 11: Veterans Day, Campus Closed
announcement.abstract: On Tuesday November 11, the campus will be closed in observance of Veterean's Day.
announcement.message:
On Tuesday November 11, the campus will be closed in observance of Veterean's Day.

See: Important Dates & Deadlines
announcement.author: admin

announcement.title: November 27 - 28: Thanksgiving Break, Campus Closed
announcement.abstract: On Thursday November 27 and Friday November 28, the campus will be closed in observance of Thanksgiving.
announcement.message:
On Thursday November 27 and Friday November 28, the campus will be closed in observance of Thanksgiving.

See: Important Dates & Deadlines
announcement.author: admin

announcement.title: December 8: Winter Fees Due
announcement.abstract: On Monday December 8, Winter Quarter fees are due.
announcement.message:
On Monday December 8, Winter Quarter fees are due.

See: Important Dates & Deadlines
announcement.author: admin

announcement.title: December 8 - 12: Final Exams
announcement.abstract: Between Monday December 8 and Friday December 12, Fall Quarter final exams are administered.
announcement.message:
Between Monday December 8 and Friday December 12, Fall Quarter final exams are administered.

See: Important Dates & Deadlines
announcement.author: admin

announcement.title: December 17: Grades Posted
announcement.abstract: Fall grades will be posted no later than Wednesday December 17.
announcement.message:
Fall grades will be posted no later than Wednesday December 17.

See: Academic Programs Calendar
announcement.author: admin

announcement.title: December 19 - January 9: Winter Add/Drop Period
announcement.abstract: Winter 2015 Add/Drop Period is from December 19, 2014 - January 9, 2015.
announcement.message:
Winter 2015 Add/Drop Period is from December 19, 2014 - January 9, 2015.

See: Important Dates & Deadlines
announcement.author: admin

announcement.title: December 25 - January 2: Winter Break - Campus Closed
announcement.abstract: The campus is closed for winter break from December 25, 2014 - January 2, 2015.
announcement.message:
The campus is closed for winter break from December 25, 2014 - January 2, 2015.

See: Important Dates & Deadlines
announcement.author: admin

announcement.title: January 5: Winter Classes Begin
announcement.abstract: Classes for Winter 2015 begin on January 5, 2015.
announcement.message:
Classes for Winter 2015 begin on January 5, 2015.

See: Important Dates & Deadlines
announcement.author: admin
